comments.author: e rivera

comments.text:
No single player, no heroes, no set classes, no space battles, only four 
maps on release, No clone wars, so Galactic Civil War only, AT-ATs on a 
rail? Yeah, it's like, hey! Let's take everything that made the previous 
games GOOD and UNIQUE and FLUSH them down the toilet and supplement them 
with the good old fashioned EA-treatment that we know EVERYONE will love us 
for. 

Seriously, is care, time and effort too much to ask for, EA? Lucasarts made 
the deadline for Episode III with BF2, and it was a blast. Here? You 
disappoint and alienate people who have been waiting ten long, painstaking 
years for a sequel to one of the best Star Wars games, in favor for the 
young and dumb Battlefail and Cowadoody audience that you KNOW will buy 
your games whether they fucking suck or not. EA, if you actually tried 
making GOOD games that appealed to both new and old gamers, like 
Battlefront to appeal to us older players, and draw in new players, you'd 
generate probably twice or more than what Battlefail 4 made in a year 
within the first month, instead of generating a quick buck before it begins 
trickling into pennies over the months as everyone wakes up to the 
bullshit. The only silver lining I see out of EA owning the license to Star 
Wars games is if they let Bioware take another crack at KoToR again... 
Maybe even give us an HD remaster for next gen consoles (I actually would 
legitimately pay for that...).

People, if you want a GOOD Battlefront game, with everything EA is taking 
AWAY from it, get Star Wars Battlefront 2 on Steam (Summer sale is coming 
up too, so now's a chance for a good deal). EA may have tried taking away 
the online multiplayer on this one, but thank god there's something called 
third party support.

Got friends who are tired of hating the Nazis? Tell them what EA did to 
Battlefront then. Christ, there's nothing fucking sacred on this Earth 
anymore.﻿

comments.text:
SOMEONE PLEASE GIVE ME HOPE HERE! As this game takes place in the glactic 
era doesnt that mean that there's the possibilty of only being able to play 
as 1 jedi and 1 sith? I mean there's Luke (perhaps obi wan and yoda but due 
to their age and inability to fight in the last 3 films highly doubted) and 
for the sith Darth Vader (and pehaps the the emperor, but once again very 
old and doesnt use his light saber in the last 3) So doesnt thay mean that 
there is a chance that we'll only be able to play as 1 jedi and 1 sith? And 
all the rest will be heros such as han solo and chewbacca or villains such 
as bounty hunters (Fett). I feel this is dissapointing as SWB2 managed to 
give us the opprtunity to play as numerous and unique jedi and sith, but I 
feel this game has focused too much on how it looks...rather than how it 
plays????﻿

comments.text:
Screw you EA for ruining one of my favorite games as a kid. Everything you 
touch turns to shit like Sims, Battlefield, Simcity, Fifa, Mass Effect and 
many other franchises. Do you really think that we want a game with only 8 
maps, no space battles, no campaign, no offline mode, 40 players, and crazy 
amounts of DLC. In this game we need to have at least 120 players on the 
same map. Guess what EA, I will never buy this game, I am going pirate the 
hell out of it, you will never get another dime from me again. Also DICE, I 
hate you too. Your game Battlefield 4 is so terrible and so Hardline too. 
You used to be such a good company but after Battlefield 2 every game you 
after that kept getting worse and worse.﻿
